verses.roman:
sambhrame pratāparudra prabhuke dharila
tāṅhāke dekhite prabhura bāhya-jñāna ha-ila

synonyms: sambhrame—with great respect; pratāparudra—King Pratāparudra; prabhuke—Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; dharila—picked up; tāṅhāke—Him; dekhite—to see; prabhura—of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; bāhya-jñāna—external consciousness; ha-ila—there was.
translation: Mahārāja Pratāparudra picked the Lord up with great respect, but upon seeing the King, Lord Caitanya Mahāprabhu came to His external senses.
